results.title: George Segal, Veteran of Drama and TV Comedy, Is Dead at 87
results.abstract: He is best remembered for his Oscar-nominated dramatic role in “Who’s Afraid of Virginia Woolf?” and was later a familiar comic actor.

results.title: Making a Movie About a Genocide That Some Still Deny
